content: materials 2 skeins of purl soho s super soft merino 1 100% merino wool each skein is approximately 87 yards/ 100 grams - color a 1 skein approximately 87 yards required we used heirloom white - color b 1 skein approximately 87 yards required we used red zinnia you will also need - us 15 10 mm 16-inch circular needles 2 gauge 10 stitches = 4 inches in garter stitch size finished dimensions 24 inches in circumference x 12 inches tall 1 https //www purlsoho com/super-soft-merino html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796
